akn:section.akn:heading: Qualifications for registration; information required for registration.

akn:content.akn:p: No registration certificate shall be issued to any person (and in the case of a person between the ages of 18 and 21, to the person and his signatory parent or guardian) or organization unless the Chief determines that such person (or the president or chief executive in the case of an organization):
Every person applying for a registration certificate shall provide on a form prescribed by the Chief:
Every organization applying for a registration certificate shall:

The Chief shall register no more than one pistol per registrant during any 30-day period; provided, that the Chief may permit a person first becoming a District resident to register more than one pistol if those pistols were lawfully owned in another jurisdiction for a period of 6 months prior to the date of the application.
